properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
CYPRUS.
DNC 10.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS:
   A. 0600Z TO 2100Z DAILY 01 THRU 05, 08, 10, 15,
      17, 22, 24, 29 AND 31 MAR IN AREA BOUND BY
      35-40N 35-00E, 35-40N 35-20E,
      34-40N 35-36E, 34-43N 34-40E.
   B. 0500Z TO 2100Z DAILY 01 THRU 05, 08, 10, 15,
      17, 22, 24, 29 AND 31 MAR IN AREA BOUND BY
      34-00N 33-10E, 34-00N 33-50E,
      33-35N 33-50E, 33-35N 33-10E.
   C. 282100Z FEB TO 312100Z MAR IN AREA BOUND BY
      35-20N 35-27E, 35-20N 35-36E,
      35-05N 35-36E, 35-05N 35-27E.
   D. 0600Z TO 2100Z DAILY 08, 11, 18, 23 AND
      30 MAR IN AREA BOUND BY
      35-37N 30-00E, 35-37N 30-31E,
      35-16N 30-31E, 35-16N 30-00E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 312200Z MAR 22.
